title: In the first Naruto series, who is stronger, Hinata or Neji? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the first naruto series it is relatively clear who is stronger as evidenced by their fight in the chunin exams  if you watch to the end, neiji has to be held back by 3 jounin to stop him from KILLING Hinata, no doubt she was pretty strong but neiji was a whole other level I would even go so far as to say he could take on gate 3 Rock lee and win

Neji is stronger, though Hinata has also been implied to be quite talented if her personality didn’t hold her back. However in the first series Neji is ahead of her by quite a bit with rotation and 64 palm though if you count protective 64 palms then Hinata could match him, but that is only in the anime and games.
